articles.title: Devon Levi wins stellar NHL debut for Buffalo Sabres - Buffalo News
articles.description: Showcasing the precise technique that earned him the crease only a few weeks after leaving Northeastern University to turn pro, Devon Levi delivered a stellar debut and Jeff Skinner scored the winner in overtime to give the Sabres a 3-2 win.
articles.content:
Devon Levis back was to center ice as he stood at his net while the crowd inside KeyBank Center serenaded the rookie in his highly anticipated NHL debut.
Le-vi, Le-vi, Levi!
The chant was in respon… [+9563 chars]
